Name: The Rebellion
About the game: The Rebellion blends traditional RTS elements with 3rd person action. Change your camera at any time to possess your hero, build structures, or give orders. You can equip every single unit in your army with whatever weapons and armor you want; including your hero. The right gear can turn a friendly unit into a miniboss waiting for your command! Key Features Knock Down and Poise System Units can be staggered or knocked down based on the size and weight of a weapon! Take Control from Above or Join the Battlefield You can quickly change your perspective to fight in 3rd person, then seamlessly transition to RTS view to build your base, manage units, or craft equipment! Limitless Individual Unit Equipment Customization Each unit can be outfitted as you see fit quickly and simply. Online Multiplayer Engage in dynamic and strategic warfare against other players or AI in a team-based or free for all environment. Wave Defense Survival Hone your skills alone or online with friends in a randomized wave defense mode. Put your strategic ability to the ultimate test against hordes of increasingly difficult AI. Musical Credits Primary Composer Zhao Shen Supplemental Music by Dylan Cooke If you give our game a chance we can promise you three things. We will always be open and honest, never be pay-to-win, and never forget that making exciting games for you to enjoy is why we started this journey. We quit our jobs three years ago to follow our dream and create games. I hope you will come along with us! Sincerely, Caz Game Design Team
